arn.description: Amazon Resource Name of the backup.

fileSystemId.description: The ID of the file system to back up. Required if backing up Lustre or Windows file systems.

kmsKeyId.description: The ID of the AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) key used to encrypt the backup of the Amazon FSx file system's data at rest.

ownerId.description: AWS account identifier that created the file system.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the file system. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level. If you have set `copy_tags_to_backups` to true, and you specify one or more tags, no existing file system tags are copied from the file system to the backup.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

type.description: The type of the file system backup.

volumeId.description: The ID of the volume to back up. Required if backing up a ONTAP Volume.

fileSystemId.description: The ID of the file system to back up. Required if backing up Lustre or Windows file systems.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the file system. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level. If you have set `copy_tags_to_backups` to true, and you specify one or more tags, no existing file system tags are copied from the file system to the backup.

volumeId.description: The ID of the volume to back up. Required if backing up a ONTAP Volume.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering Backup resources.
